Case Closed begins with The Hatchet House Theft Matter, the June 27, 1951, episode of Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar.

(30:37) Our second case is Dead Man’s Letter, from Richard Diamond Private Detective. This episode originally aired November 8, 1950.
